author: husted
msg: WW-1308 Disable include of jasperreport and JSF results by default. Specify the JSF result in the appropriate package of the showcase application.

author: gnodet
msg: Upgrade to xfire-1.2, spring 2.0-rc3 and jetty 6.0-rc2
Add missing xbean-classloader jar in distribution

author: jmsnell
msg: Fixing a NPE that occurs when inserting an entry created from the Factory.
feed.insertEntry(factory.newEntry()); // caused a NPE in Axiom
Explicitly setting the inserted entries parent prior to the insert resolves the problem

author: pcl
msg: changed @since tags to disambiguate the Kodo information with future releases of OpenJPA by adding a 0. to the beginning of each.
